title: Rapid decomp depletes tropical soil nutrients

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following processes. 
(A) Photosynthesis 
(B) Eutrophication 
(C) Denitrification 
(D) Decomposition 
(E) Transpiration
content.question: The rapid rate of this process in tropical forests results in low-nutrient soils

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
